# comfyui-cli

Use comfy-cli to install, launch, update, snapshot/restore, and safely manage ComfyUI environments without breaking dependencies. Use when installing or launching ComfyUI, updating it, managing node or model installs via CLI, or recovering from a broken environment with snapshots/restores. Use only when the user explicitly mentions ComfyUI, ComfyUI workflows, custom_nodes, models/, ComfyUI-Mana...
